General.Name: Iconic Labs Plc
General.Description: Iconic Labs Plc engages in media and technology business, focuses providing online media; artificial intelligence; and big data gathering, processing, and analysis products. It is also involved in the trading activities. The company was formerly known as WideCells Group PLC and changed its name to Iconic Labs Plc in July 2019. Iconic Labs Plc was founded in 2012 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Waverley House, London, United Kingdom, W1F 8GQ

1.Name: Dr. Peter  Hollands
1.Title: Director of WideCells Storage and Research Division & Group's Chief Scientific Officer
